Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install caller_module`

Usage
`````


.. code:: python

    >>> from caller_module import caller_module

    >>> module = caller_module()


Examples
````````


.. code:: python

    >>> module = caller_module() # parent module
    <module '<name>' from 'path/to/parent_module.py'>
